app_does_what: Step-by-Step Guidance for Performing Umrah al-Mufradah According to Fiqh Ja‘fariyyah
warning_page_text:
According to the fatwas of Ayatollah Sistani, a person may enter into the state of ihram for Umrah for himself only once in a single lunar month.
However, he may perform a proxy (niyābah) Umrah on behalf of others any number of times.
(The determining factor is entering into ihram, not the completion of all the rites of Umrah.)
